languages.text: Издание декрета ужесточит квоты производства и обречет отстающих на участь быть переработанными в трупную муку для поощрения самых усердных слуг.
Issuing this decree will significantly tighten production quotas, dooming laggards to being processed into corpse starch, which will encourage the most diligent servants.
languages.original_text: Издание декрета ужесточит квоты производства и обречет отстающих на участь быть переработанными в трупную муку для поощрения самых усердных слуг.

traits.locale_text: Issuing this decree will significantly tighten production quotas and doom laggards to the fate of being processed into corpse starch to encourage the most diligent servants.
Issuing this decree will significantly tighten production quotas and doom laggards to the fate of being processed into corpse starch to encourage the most diligent servants.
Issuing this decree will significantly tighten production quotas, dooming laggards to being processed into corpse starch, which will encourage the most diligent servants.
Issuing this decree will significantly tighten production quotas, dooming laggards to being processed into corpse starch, which will encourage the most diligent servants.
Issuing this decree will significantly tighten production quotas, dooming laggards to being processed into corpse starch, which will encourage the most diligent servants.

languages.text: La promulgation de ce décret augmentera nettement les quotas de production en condamnant les tire-au-flanc à être transformés en fécule de cadavre, ce qui motivera les serviteurs les plus diligents.
languages.original_text: Issuing this decree will significantly tighten production quotas, dooming laggards to being processed into corpse starch, which will encourage the most diligent servants.

traits.locale_text: La promulgation de ce décret augmentera nettement les quotas de production en condamnant les tire-au-flanc à être transformés en fécule de cadavre, ce qui motivera les serviteurs les plus diligents.

languages.text: この法令を発布すれば、生産ノルマが大幅に強化され、遅れた者はコープススターチに加工される運命にある。このことは最も勤勉な従者の励みとなるだろう。
languages.original_text: Issuing this decree will significantly tighten production quotas, dooming laggards to being processed into corpse starch, which will encourage the most diligent servants.

traits.locale_text: この法令を発布すれば、生産ノルマが大幅に強化され、遅れた者はコープススターチに加工される運命にある。このことは最も勤勉な従者の励みとなるだろう。

languages.text: 颁布这一法令将大大收紧生产配额。进度落后者将被加工成尸体淀粉，奖励给最勤奋的仆人。
languages.original_text: Issuing this decree will significantly tighten production quotas, dooming laggards to being processed into corpse starch, which will encourage the most diligent servants.

traits.locale_text: 颁布这一法令将大大收紧生产配额。进度落后者将被加工成尸体淀粉，奖励给最勤奋的仆人。

languages.text: La promulgación de este decreto endurecerá considerablemente las cuotas de producción, condenando a los rezagados a ser transformados en almidón de cadáveres, lo que animará a los sirvientes más diligentes.
languages.original_text: Issuing this decree will significantly tighten production quotas, dooming laggards to being processed into corpse starch, which will encourage the most diligent servants.

traits.locale_text: La promulgación de este decreto endurecerá considerablemente las cuotas de producción, condenando a los rezagados a ser transformados en almidón de cadáveres, lo que animará a los sirvientes más diligentes.

languages.text: Durch diesen Erlass werden die Produktionsquoten deutlich verschärft. Faulpelze werden dazu verdammt, zu Leichenstärke verarbeitet zu werden. Das wird die Diener zu größtem Fleiß motivieren.
languages.original_text: Issuing this decree will significantly tighten production quotas, dooming laggards to being processed into corpse starch, which will encourage the most diligent servants.

traits.locale_text: Durch diesen Erlass werden die Produktionsquoten deutlich verschärft. Faulpelze werden dazu verdammt, zu Leichenstärke verarbeitet zu werden. Das wird die Diener zu größtem Fleiß motivieren.

languages.text: Asgari üretim sınırlarını bir hayli sıkılaştıracak bu fermanı duyurmak, aylaklardan ceset nişastası yapılmasını yasalaştırarak en çalışkan hizmetkârları teşvik edecektir.
languages.original_text: Issuing this decree will significantly tighten production quotas, dooming laggards to being processed into corpse starch, which will encourage the most diligent servants.
